attributes.action: Stop Age Discrimination Against Future Voters.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is in response to the Government BANNING a group of Scouts from visiting Parliament and MP's because they were 'not of voting age'. This stinks of hyprocrisy and PROVES the Government cannot abide by it's own legislation set by them and the EU. Time to choose Ladies and Gentlemen. One rule for all!

rejection.details: We we cannot accept your petition as we cannot verify these statements. Queries about visiting Parliament are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. Information on visiting Parliament can be found here: http://www.parliament.uk/visiting/index.cfm
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
